Text:
The torrent, http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6219140 has a shortcut to
the bootit NG image but NOT the file itself!

This torrent 
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6221430 is the missing file, bootitng.iso which creates the
Bootit NG boot CD onto a blank CD.  You need a CD or DVD burner
and burning software.

Without this software you cannot restore the image of Vista onto 
a spare 80 GB HD.

Sorry for the inconvenience!

March 05, 2011

Has anyone tried this torrent?
Does it work?
Let me know

OK Looks like this torrent has been blocked!

If you woul like me to send you this image of Windows Vista on DVD disks then send me an email.  Please give me your address where I may send you this image along with instructions free of charge.

My email address is cccharlz@gmail.com

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6219140/Vista_Ultimate_Lite_32

I could NOT get this image to boot on HP TouchSmart PC IQ775.

My image of Windows 7 Ultimate booted on first try!

Otherwise this image will boot on 9+ of 10 computers designed to run Vista

Frequently the Vista image will not boot on newer vista machines. 

If so you can boot spare HD on a compatable PC. 

Use regedit to edit registry settings of HKLM/System/CurrentControlSet/Services/

Change the start DWORD values for msahci from 3 to 0 and, pciide 
from 0 to 3.

Replace spare HD and your boot should succeed.

Please note sometimes even my Windows 7 image needs this registry hack!

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6221430 is the missing file, bootitng.iso which creates the
Bootit NG boot CD onto a blank CD. 

You need a CD or DVD burner and burning software.

Without this software you cannot restore the image of Vista onto a spare 80 GB HD.

Sorry for the inconvenience!
